name: Board Games
description:
With these fun board games you will enjoy with whole family, the game allows up to 4 players.

Contains the following games:
- Snakes and Ladders:
- Parchís (ludo)
- The game of goose
- 3 in a row (Tic Tac Toe)

The game also allows to play against computer, with an artificial intelligence suitable for all the public.

Enjoy pescAPPs games!
